title: Coca-Cola
description: Coca-Cola is a globally recognized brand in the beverage industry, known for its iconic red color ('F40000') that symbolizes energy and vitality. The brand palette also includes complementary colors like black ('000000'), white ('FFFFFF'), and a mix of warm tones such as orange ('FF560E') and yellow ('F79900'). These colors are featured across various brand documents, including the Coca-Cola Foundation's Visual Identity guidelines.
